Sentencas: Zirconia-based materials are widely investigated and used as electrolytes in solid-oxide fuel cells, oxygen sensors and electrochemical devices.
Titulo: Grain-size/(t or c)-phase relationship in dense ZrO2 ceramics

Sentencas: These materials present polymorphism, which has a critical effect on their technologically important properties.
Titulo: Grain-size/(t or c)-phase relationship in dense ZrO2 ceramics

Sentencas: The polymorphism is influenced by, among other factors, aliovalent dopant nature and content, grain size and interfacial energy.
Titulo: Grain-size/(t or c)-phase relationship in dense ZrO2 ceramics

Sentencas: In this work, we investigated the crystal structure of ZrO2-12 mol% CaO and -9 mol% Y2O3 dense ceramics as a function of grain size.
Titulo: Grain-size/(t or c)-phase relationship in dense ZrO2 ceramics

Sentencas: We found that the samples undergo a phase transition from the t '' form of the tetragonal phase to the cubic phase with an increase in grain size.
Titulo: Grain-size/(t or c)-phase relationship in dense ZrO2 ceramics

Sentencas: This transition is directly detected by Raman spectroscopy and further evidence is given by a change in the activation energy for bulk ionic conduction.
Titulo: Grain-size/(t or c)-phase relationship in dense ZrO2 ceramics

Sentencas: The transition occurs at an average grain size greater than 500 nm for both systems.
Titulo: Grain-size/(t or c)-phase relationship in dense ZrO2 ceramics
